selection.title: Find people according to interests, goals, favorite activities and even by character

couple.title: Somewhere on Earth, there is a person who is the right match for you
couple.additional: Perhaps, you do not know about each other’s existence yet

rare.title:
Only a rare chance could bring you together
The time is now
rare.additional: You are a combination of different tastes, interests, and outlooks on life. Finding a similar person is too difficult, but it is not a problem for us

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.additional: Today everyone has their digital portrait based on metadata
howItWorks.description:
You do not have to worry about the privacy of your data, since only you choose the information that appears in the public domain. Therefore, we will use only the metadata you provide to find people who are the most suitable for you.

For instance, you could find people with similar interests in TikTok video categories or with the same VK subscriptions.

notEasy.title: It is not that easy
notEasy.additional: We have created our own machine learning algorithms that allow you to project your digital twin into the Web. These «metacopies» have certain preferences and character.
notEasy.description: Digital twins are compared by additional algorithms. As a result, the most fitting people are matched to you.

cards.title: Lack of time
cards.description: If you work hard every day and do not have time for dating, you will find a person with the same pace of life

cards.title: Talking points
cards.description: The search for topics for a conversation remains in the past, we have already selected the ideal pen pal for you

cards.title: Loneliness
cards.description: Because of the lack of common interests you can feel lonely even with lots of friends. Our service will help you to find a person with the same traits

cards.title: Search for friends
cards.description: Dating services only provide romantic offers. In contrast, our status systems will immediatly show what a person is looking for. A friend? A loved one? Or both?

show.title: Inkast knows this person and is ready to introduce you to each other

members.name: Alena Samarina
members.description:

Multiple winner of case championships and hackathons

members.name: Alexander Greene

Winner of the HSE Olympiad in the field of design and multiple winner of hackathons

members.name: Fedor Kabachenko
members.description:
Carried out projects for the Central Bank, Rosatom, ParSeq, OneCell and BIOCAD

Unemployed, but earns

members.name: Natalia Maltseva
members.description:
Developer at Arrival. Built a racing car in the electrics department. Performed projects for Mars, Schlumberger, Danone. Conducted programming training for students.

The recipient of the UMNIK grant. Winner of hackathons and case championships.

members.name: Anna Grokhotova
members.description:
Carry out projects in the field of neurotechnology

Know how our brain works and what people need

follow.title:
Let’s be
friends!
follow.additional: Subscribe for updates so you do not miss the launch
